subtitle: my life's work relates to human
development which I call by Nature's
design and very early on in my career
really very early on in my life I was
always sensitive to things that seemed
to go against the grain
and in studying human development it was
very clear to me that there is a
blueprint that is granted to us with
every birth of a child and yet that
blueprint needs to be answered to by a
culture that's open and sensitive to
what's being called out
and what's been called out is so
beautiful and it doesn't only call out
from the child but it calls out from the
community and the parents
um a way of responding that has been
erased in many ways by different
cultures
